# 消电行业数据中台解决方案白皮书

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xiaodian-xingye-shuju-zhong-tai-jiejuefangan-baipishu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xiaodian-xingye-shuju-zhong-tai-jiejuefangan-baipishu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xiaodian-xingye-shuju-zhong-tai-jiejuefangan-baipishu
xiaodian-xingye-shuju-zhong-tai-jiejuefangan-baipishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xiaodian-xingye-shuju-zhong-tai-jiejuefangan-baipishu
xiaodian-xingye-shuju-zhong-tai-jiejuefangan-baipishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
